contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {| class="toccolours" border="1" cellpadding="4" style="float: right; margin: 0 0 1em 1em; width:250px; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%; clear: right" |+ style="margin-left: inherit; font-size: medium;" | '''Osiedle Bema''' |- align=center | colspan="2" style="background:#ffffff;" | <!-- Missing image removed: [[Image:Bema.jpg|180px|Location of Osiedle Bema]] --> |- style="vertical-align: top;" | '''Area''' | - |- style="vertical-align: top;" | '''Population''' | - |- style="vertical-align: top;" | '''Population density''' | - |- style="vertical-align: top;" | colspan=2 |<center><span style="font-size:100%;">'''Website'''</span></center> |} '''Osiedle Bema''' is one of the districts of the [[Poland|Polish]] city of [[Białystok]]. Named after [[Józef Bem]]. == External links == {{commons category|Bema (district of Białystok)}} {{Białystok}} {{coord missing|Podlaskie Voivodeship}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Osiedle Bema, Bialystok}} [[Category:Districts of Białystok]] {{Podlasie-geo-stub}}
